# The `HTTPServer.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the methods of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver">HTTPServer</a> class and the streamFile function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the methods of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver">HTTPServer</a> class and the streamFile function.

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (Offset &lt; Response.ContentLength) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
